00045 /* Frame initialisation */
00046 TBVFrame::TBVFrame(wxFrame *frame, const wxString& title,wxPoint pos, wxSize size)
00047                         : wxFrame(frame, -1, title,pos,size)
00048 {
00049     // Loading icon
00050         // wxIcon icon(sirs_xpm);
00051     //SetIcon(icon);
00052         
00053     // adding status bar
00054         CreateStatusBar(2,0,ID_STATUS);
00055         
00056         // dessin de l'interface
00057         wxPanel * top_panel = new wxPanel (this, -1,wxDefaultPosition,wxDefaultSize );
00058         INTERFACE(top_panel, FALSE);
00059         
00060         // create the menu
00061         SetMenuBar(MENU());
00062         
00063         
00064         // define as log window
00065         //wxTextCtrl * myTextCtrl = ;
00066         wxLog::SetActiveTarget (new wxLogTextCtrl ((wxTextCtrl *) FindWindowById(ID_LOG,this)));
00067         
00068         // programm started
00069         wxLogMessage(_("Program started"));
00070         
00071 }

00079 void TBVFrame::OnOpenDatabase(wxCommandEvent & event)
00080 {
00081         wxArrayString myStringArray;
00082         
00083         if(myDatabase.DataBaseOpen(_("/Users/Lucien/DATA/PRJ/TOOLMAP/TestBDD/BDD/data/")))
00084         {
00085                 wxLogMessage(_("Database opened"));
00086                 
00087                 myStringArray = myDatabase.DataBaseListTables();
00088                 
00089                 // add database name
00090                 TreeAddItem(_("essai"),0);
00091                 
00092                 // add tables names
00093                 for (int i=0; i<myStringArray.Count(); i++) 
00094                 {
00095                         TreeAddItem(myStringArray.Item(i),1);
00096                 }
00097                 
00098         }
00099         else
00100         {
00101                 wxLogError(_("Error opening the database"));
00102         }
00103         
00104 
00105 
00106 }

00109 void TBVFrame::OnQuit(wxCloseEvent & event)
00110 {
00111                 // if the database is opened, we close the database.
00112                 if (myDatabase.DataBaseIsOpen()) 
00113                 {
00114                         myDatabase.DataBaseClose();
00115                 }
00116                 
00117                 this->Destroy();
00118 
00119 }
00120 
00121 void TBVFrame::TreeAddItem (wxString tname, int parent)
00122 {
00123         wxTreeCtrl * myTreeCtrl = (wxTreeCtrl *) FindWindowById(ID_LISTTABLE,this);
00124         
00125         if (parent == 0) 
00126         {
00127                 myTreeCtrl->AddRoot (tname); 
00128         }
00129         else 
00130                 myTreeCtrl->AppendItem(myTreeCtrl->GetRootItem(),tname);
00131         
00132 }
